Linguistics     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Linguistics      Linguistics   Main Menu    Academics           Linguistics    Chinese    Japanese    Korean         People           Faculty    Affiliated and Emeritus Faculty    Language Program Contacts         About           Administration    News    Events    Contact Us         School of LCSL     Eyebrow menu    lcsl.uic.edu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Japanese      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Linguistics    Academics    Japanese        The Japanese program at UIC offers students the opportunity to explore the language and culture of Japan without leaving Chicago.       Benefits of Japanese   With over 125 million native speakers, learning Japanese can open all kinds of doors in fields like   information technology  fashion  communication  design  digital media  finance and business  education  science and engineering  and more!   We hope you find something useful on this homepage. If you’d like to read additional information about our program or have suggestions/questions, we’d love to hear from you ! Please feel free to contact us .
